summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of WiFi Configuration Tool for Widget OS watch. All core functionality working correctly including navigation, form inputs, network management, and file download.
passed_tests: WiFi Config page loads correctly at /widget-os/wifi-config
Connect Watch button visible and properly configured for WebSerial
WiFi Networks section with SSID and Password input fields functional
Add Network button works (enforces max 5 networks limit)
Location Settings (City, Country, GMT offset) inputs functional
Password show/hide toggle works for all network fields
Download config.txt button generates and downloads valid config file
Navigation link from Widget OS page to WiFi Config Tool works
Back navigation from WiFi Config to Widget OS works
Form validation and state management working
